trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGSF103_05241_SEQ_00<tab>Wawlika has a message to share with you.
TEXT_KINGSF103_05241_WAWLIKA_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, glad you're here! Zawpya told me he needs to speak with you.
TEXT_KINGSF103_05241_WAWLIKA_000_001<tab>As for why he didn't simply track you down himself, your guess is as good as mine...
TEXT_KINGSF103_05241_WAWLIKA_000_002<tab>At any rate, you'll find him over at Shaaloani Station. Safe travels!
TEXT_KINGSF103_05241_WAWLIKA_000_010<tab>Sorry, friend, but Zawpya didn't tell me why he asked for you. He should be at the station.
TEXT_KINGSF103_05241_ZAWPYA_000_020<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Perfect timing. You see, I have a problem...
TEXT_KINGSF103_05241_ZAWPYA_000_021<tab>It's the Dawnblazer. I know she detonated in the line of duty, but try as I might, I can't get that armored angel out of my mind!

TEXT_KINGSF103_05241_ZAWPYA_000_022<tab>After she came up in conversation the other day, it relit a fire in me. One thing led to another, and I found myself stitching together a little something inspired by her design.
TEXT_KINGSF103_05241_ZAWPYA_000_023<tab>I know how crazy this must sound, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but I'd really love for you to have this ensemble!
TEXT_KINGSF103_05241_ZAWPYA_000_024<tab>(And if it's not to your liking, maybe you could find a roundabout way of asking Nitowikwe what she thinks of it...?)
TEXT_KINGSF103_05241_ZAWPYA_000_025<tab>Just think about it, all right? Together, we can keep her memory alive. Through us, the Dawnblazer will ride on!
